• Interactive Seismology

    Computational lab to provide the students with interactive simulations that help them to comprehend concepts of seismology

Course Logistics

Grading

Assignments (40%); Mid term presentations (30%); End term exam (30%)

  • Late assignments will receive no credit, please submit

Mid/End Term Exams

Open book exams, where you will have access to textbook chapters/ other reading material. The exam duration will be 3 Hrs. The only thing that will not be allowed is interaction with peers.
